website_summaries.verdict: An affordable advent calendar for any child who loves cars and trucks.
pros: Includes 24 different vehicle toys, including cars, trucks, and construction vehicles
Also includes a tear off race track
Spoiler: the Dec. 24 toy is a fire truck with a moveable ladder
cons: Some buyers said some of the cars fell apart

customer_reviews.title: Very fun - for price it’s great
customer_reviews.text: So you can’t compare these cars to hot wheels. Don’t try to. The hot wheels advent calendar is more expensive and you don’t get 24 cars, there for sure. But these have something hot wheels don’t have. They pull back and race forward! My kiddo loves it. So far the cars have been of good quality For the price and no broken or other low quality issues. But if that changes I will update this review. Nab it on sale. My five year old is super happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: CC✨👩🏻‍🍳✨

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it’d be cute for my son who is a cars/vehicle fanatic but the vehicles are very cheaply made (all plastic)... not worth the price at all.. very disappointed and #7 was missing right out of the box!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie C.

customer_reviews.title: Cars are much nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about purchasing this advent calendar instead of the Hot Wheels advent calendar since the cars are plastic. I was worried they might be cheap looking, but since the Hot Wheels calendar only had 8 cars I decided to take a chance on this set. I am so happy that I did. This is a really nice advent calendar. The box is decorated nicely and is very colorful. I opened it to make sure all of the cars were there and was pleasantly surprised by how nice the cars are. There is also a nice variety of cars. My grandson is going to love it. I would definitely purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: James O.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo really enjoyed this! I will say the cars come apart with slight effort but they are also easy to snap back together. They dont break apart easily but if you are intentionally trying to do so, a kid would be strong enough. He likes to take things apart So it works for him. He still has several of them left and still enjoys playing with them after having this set for over a month. They are light weight. I would not suggest these if you have a little who likes to put things in their mouth etc, as they are small/have smaller parts that come can detach with some effort.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves cars but if you get this in the major brand version it only comes with 6 cars and the rest of the days are road signs. BUT this one has a vehicle for everyday. Granted some are the same car just different colors but that just a few. My kid loved waking up and pulling back the tabs to see a fire truck, ambulance, gas truck, race car, etc. Pretty cool and pretty affordable considering it’s 24 cars. Oh yeah the cars themselves are made of cheapest plastic but it’s for a toddler. He doesn’t know. The cars can be pulled backwards the let go and are propelled forward.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cute variety of little vehicles
customer_reviews.text: These cute little vehicles aren't in the same category as Match Box cars or Hot Wheels, but for the price they are pretty cute. I will be breaking up the set and putting them in six Operation Christmas Child shoeboxes. I'm sure the kids will enjoy them. Some appear to be duplicate styles, just painted different colors, but that won't be a problem , and the cars and other vehicles are not in proportion to each other, but again, I think the kids will enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter's MomTop Contributor: Scrapbooking

customer_reviews.title: Car kids will LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Nephew is obsessed with vehicles and I thought he would be old enough to get the concept of advent calendar so this seemed like a win. Well, the one a day was a huge disappointment once he learned there were cars and trucks in this. But he stuck it out and had an amazing time getting up and getting a new car every day. Vehicles 1-15 were even packed to go on the family cruise they were loved so much! Kids don't care if they are fancy name brand cars or trucks at all, so this is perfect for them!
customer_reviews.author: TheKnucks

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun Advent Calendar!
customer_reviews.text: Super excited for this purchase! I can’t wait for my boys to use this during Christmas time. I thought the cars would be little tiny miniature cars, but the are normal size like hot wheels! They are not are not metal like the hot wheel toys, just plastic. They came with lots of fun different kinds of vehicles too, cement mixer, garbage truck, police vehicle,etc. This will be way better than a chocolate advent calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Fun yet cheap advent calendar.
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year old loved this! Every morning he would be up asking to open the next car and really enjoyed it! He did quickly notice that there are a lot of similar vehicles in it (same mold, different color and stickers) but he still liked it - a lot! The cars themselves are nothing great (they're cheap plastic after all!). Still, it was a lot of fun for him!
customer_reviews.author: J. Horst

customer_reviews.title: Good advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been doing toy advent calendars for a few years. I don't like the expensive calendars out there that only have a few things and then a ton of accessories that my kids will instantly loose. The cars are plastic and sure, they aren't going to last forever, but they are good for a Christmas treat. My son is excited every morning to get a new vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: SuperDooper

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great anytime gift, not only an Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome assortment of cars. They even all have pull back & go feature. Yes they are plastic but for the price its fine. This would be great even as just a Christmas gift vs Advent Calendar. What little boy wouldn't love 25 cars in a box? My son was so excited to get this. I let him open the whole thing at once because he just couldn't wait. Perfect to wrap & give on Christmas! Or even buy and give for a birthday.
customer_reviews.author: JudesMommy13

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son instead of chocolate one. It's great, has many different cars. I wish there will something else but car as well -to make it more surprising (car stickers or tattoo, road signs, etc. ). The cars quality is not the best one, but I love the variety. Hope to find something similar to this one next year (not this one just because have it now.)
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's great so far, we are only on night 2 but my son has loved it. The only thing I wish you could do is detach the road easily because my son is only 4 and I cannot 100% trust he will not open every door when my back is turned. Also the road being a bit more sturdy would make it better.
customer_reviews.author: KLuv

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this advent calender for my grandson because the Hot wheels one was sold out until after Christmas. It was boxed nice although the punch out square for each day was a little hard to open. I liked The road you could tear off the box to use with the vehicles. The toy vehicles inside were cheaply made and the majority of them are now broke. The positives of this box was the road on the box to add to play and some of them were pullbacks which he enjoyed. I would not recommend. It was a good concept and a cute package but lacked quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and I bought a Hot Wheels brand one for my other one. This one cost same amount (actually I think $2 more) than name brand Hot Wheels and the vehicles are much more cheaply made. It's my understanding this a is a smaller company so they probably don't have the resources to make them in high production to offer cheaper. Most the stickers for the vehicles are on crooked. The box and fold down road in front of it are large and cumbersome. Not going to be a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to get this calendar. The excitement left whenever he started opening windows and getting duplicate toys. The cars are very low quality and he's gotten 3 fire trucks in the past week. Would've liked him to get a different surprise everyday instead of wanting to put the cars back into the box.....
customer_reviews.author: iluv2teach

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cheap quality toys.
customer_reviews.text: Cars are incredibly lightweight and very cheap plastic. I’ve ordered other advent calenders from this company and have been thrilled with the quality of the toys but very disappointed with how flimsy and cheap those cars are. Not anywhere near the quality of matchbox cars or party favors. Think more along the lines of vending machine or where you’re not sure if this is plastic or plastic covered paper toys. Cars barely would roll due to cheap construction. I would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Macefield Property Group

customer_reviews.title: Good size and variety but could be better quality
customer_reviews.text: I like that the cars are a little bigger than the hot wheel size and you get a car everyday but the cars could be a little sturdier. They are cheap plastic and most broke before they say was done. Your child has to play very careful with them but that is sometimes hard for little boys. They do have a nice variety of cars and trucks which is nice
customer_reviews.author: Scrawford1120

customer_reviews.title: Toddler joy
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot of fun for a toddler. He loves to get his car every day and doesn't even need all the other presents under the tree. They are plastic cars, but he hasn't been able to break any so far and the variety has been good. Still a couple left but we are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jolyn

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: My son loves anything to do with a truck or tractor so I decided to get him an advent calendar with that theme. After reading reviews this one seemed like a goof choice. I ordered it and found out that the reviews were a bit misleading. The quality of the trucks is very poor. A couple came apart on the first day. The stickers were not even on correctly on some cars and coming off on others. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cmkolker

customer_reviews.title: Duplicates galore! :(
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is ok. The vehicles are all plastic with stickers, but that’s about what I expected for the price. The selection of vehicles is a bit frustrating though. The first 10ish days were great- something new and different every day. However, for the past 5 days, my son has opened the door to find the exact same car he opened the day before, and he gets so disappointed. I had assumed there would not be any duplicates- that’s kinda the point of an advent calendar like this. Sadly, this is not the case. Be prepared for duplicates!
customer_reviews.author: Megan T.

customer_reviews.title: Not an advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is not an advent calendar that can be put on the wall. The box is flimsy, has no hole to hang on the wall, and and the drawing is very simple. It is best described as a box with little cars inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: My son, being a huge vehicle lover, and having zero patience, opened all the cars on the first. He loved them- they truly made him happy. He plays with the track every day with all his toy cars. However, the cars in the calender are cheaply made and several promptly broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broken toy
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable advent calendar. I was looking for one that had consistent toys every day. However, my son opened day 2, took out the swat truck, pulled the toy back and it broke in his hands on the first try. I'd understand if he was being destructive, but no, it's cheap. I put it back together and it fell apart before I gave it back. Now all day I'll hear him talk about the broken car.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old absolutely loves this!! The cars are decent quality, most if not all are pull back cars and theres a ton of them!! He has been getting 2 cars a day because his brother's is for 12 days and his is 25! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chantia M.

customer_reviews.title: met my expectations, perfect for car lovers at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old son loves this so much. Great price and great sized toy cars. My only problem is a few of them have broken but I chop that up to my very destructive child who loves to take things apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Guignard

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality cars
customer_reviews.text: The wind-back on the vehicles worked really great. 1 box truck broke shortly after getting it but out of 24 it’s not bad. I do wish there were more construction vehicles; there were a lot of the “sports car” just in different colors which didn’t impress a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best advent calendar I’ve ever purchased especially for the price!!! They are pull back and release cars!! Totally awesome gift from the elf on the shelf!! My step son loved it and tbh I think my daughter was a bit jelly even though she received a bath bomb for every day of the month lol
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burgin

customer_reviews.title: If you have a car obsessed kid you can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his advent calendar. The cars are pretty cheap but I didn’t expect great quality for the price haha. I like that it comes with a “road” that pulls off. My son races his cars along it all day!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hebner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box of Cars.
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons really enjoyed the cars in this Advent Calendar. Although they are plastic they are pull back which makes up for the plastic. Several are the same model just a different color and they noticed! But overall worth it for 24 days of "look what I got today".
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this so much and really enjoyed each gift for each day! Definitely worth the money.. would like to order again next year
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Young Boys!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect and fun Advent calendar for my 2 small grandsons! One opened a door each day, as you expect. The other opened his all at once!! Each one enjoyed it, a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jamma

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons loved them not real dorabale but good enough for little kids. Boys liked racing them.they loved getting a new car everyday. Helps them keeps track till santa comes. Perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Update: my son still loved this but the last day was a disappointment. For the 23 and 24 it was thevsame exact firetruck. Not even different ones. He was so sad when he opened his last one. At least do a different color or something. My son loves this! Perfect for a 2 year old boy! Yes, some of the cars will break if you drop them. I put a little super glue on them and they go back together perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this Advent calendar this year and she loved getting all the cars and trucks each day until Christmas. Good price for getting 24 vehicles. Would recommend for any car and truck loving child. No missing or broken pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: They aren't Hot wheels.
customer_reviews.text: The vehicles were of a good variety, and we're the line that you pull back and they go for a bit, however they are not very sturdy, the baseplate snaps in place beneath both bumpers and hold the wheels on plastic hooks - so for a 4+ year old that likes vehicles, they're great, for my two year old twins who like vehicles, they were easily dismantled.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Sons couldn’t wait!
customer_reviews.text: My son could not wait to see what car he would get the next day. Awesome calendar. I just wish the cars were a little studier cause they are just made out of plastic. My son is going to play with them regardless but that’s my gripe.
customer_reviews.author: nicola houston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a great calendar! We’re only on day two but the quality of the cars far exceeds my expectations. They have movable parts and seem to hold up under the not so gentle use of a two year old. My son is so happy so far, I’d highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little boy counting down to Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for your money so many cars my nephew love this product he had a new car every day as he countdown to Christmas and now he has seized collection of cars it really is a good product worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Kim Paylor kim. paylor

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea but cheap product
customer_reviews.text: It's a super cute idea and something my son would love but most of the cars are no good. I'm sad as it's too late for a new calendar and I know he wont be able to keep most of the cars as they are very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: aricka

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: My son broke every car within about 10 seconds of opening them. He now has his very on used parts lots. Aka junkyard lol. I would not open again
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Not even worth it. Every toy my son has taken out (that would be 13, since it's Dec. 13) has broken within the first 5 minutes. Car won't even stay together. The other reviews are very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Fox

customer_reviews.title: Boys love it.
customer_reviews.text: Boys love it. Cheap little cars but great for leading up to better ones at Christmas. Even better since no candy in it kids aren’t hyper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Cheap toys.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but, the cars are extremely cheap and fell apart within 15 min. Now I’m contemplating on buying another advent calendar, so the kids won’t cry when the toy falls apart. Waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: gladelina maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Christmas Lead Up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great nephews. Ages 5 and 1. It’s perfect. The quality is amazing. And it’s better than a Christmas present. Thank you for this option.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Dee

customer_reviews.title: Christmas count down
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a sturdy box and we are saving it for Christmas. I know my son will be so excited to open it every day and receive a new little car. It’s a great gift idea for boys!!
customer_reviews.author: Krirea

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a 6 year old boy and he loved it, loved opening a new door and getting a new car each day.
customer_reviews.author: PandaV

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Advent Calendar!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by the quality of the little trucks and cars. They are quite detailed. My 2 and a half year old grandson was so excited with them. Of course, he wanted to open all the windows on day one.
customer_reviews.author: CKH

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old boy who loves cars. I did some research and didn't want anything too flimsy but also not super expensive and this fit the bill perfectly. He would pop out of bed every morning to see what he got and still plays with the toys. Highly recommend for your advent calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Klecker

customer_reviews.title: Fun advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: Three year old loves this! Only problem is getting him to wait until the next day to open the next door!
customer_reviews.author: Gwyneth Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic, but the kid loved it while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: We got this advent calendar for our toddler because it's the only one that came with 24 cars. He was thrilled. Many of them broke apart quite easily though.
customer_reviews.author: A&J

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Pull Back Cars-may not last long
customer_reviews.text: These cars are plastic and while they roll well and the pull back mechanism shoots them forward just fine - my almost 3 yr old has already broken 1 and it’s only the 9th day of the advent. Would have liked if they were metal.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna K

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have not open it yet it is for Christmas this year but it came fast and the box box was very nice done .
customer_reviews.author: Iiz

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar serves its purpose and I would say the price matches the quality. The cars are made with cheap plastic and can easily break. Needless to say, my daughter didn’t notice and still enjoyed getting a new car each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This was nice for my toddler since I didn’t want to give him candy but the aren’t sturdy like hot wheels. A few broke but majority are still together and being played with
customer_reviews.author: Kristine P

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap little cars, my son loved them, but they do come apart easily. Great buy for the $ though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap cars. They all broke apart within seconds of play!
customer_reviews.text: The toys are very cheap and some broke apart in my hand when the slightest touch. They surely did not withstand my toddler...
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic131

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Good value. Good way to occupy time while waiting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Most days my 2 year old son loved opening this. However on a couple of days we were really disappointed. One car (ambulance) had no bottom or wheels, and 2 or 3 of the cars had streaky or messed up paint jobs.
customer_reviews.author: M Peters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 3 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: After my son saw the Christmas presents under the tree and realized he wasn’t able to open them for a while, I knew I needed to do something! This advent calendar was PERFECT!! A few cars snapped apart but we were easily able to get them back together. Some of the cars even have the wind up option and they’re fast little guys! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Son loved the product. Not Hot Wheels quality, but still durable enough to last awhile especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawpack

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Perfect for our 2 Year Old!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and our 2 year old absolutely loved opening these every day. And now we have 24 vehicles ranging from fire trucks to race cars for only $13! A great alternative to candy advent calendars. And much cheaper than the $25-$35 licensed advent calendars. I think these are a perfect option for 1 1/2 to 3 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Lewin Family

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun cars!
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect little cars for my grandson! Every car runs forward when pulled backward.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Cars
customer_reviews.text: I knew they were plastic cars but these are the cheapest, flimsiest plastic cars I have ever seen. This is total garbage. It's seriously not worth $5. Think about the cheapest dollar store cars you've ever had your child beg you to buy and then take the quality down by 80% and that's a little better quality still then these cars are. So disappointed and if we hadn't already opened a few days I'd of returned this junk
customer_reviews.author: Jmck

customer_reviews.title: Given as gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift, they will start using dec 1 so then I will have more info
customer_reviews.author: deborah l west

customer_reviews.title: Potty training tool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for potty training my grandson for awards when he pooped. They were good cars for the value and definitely a great motivator
customer_reviews.author: Dicy1719

customer_reviews.title: Awesome advent calendar for a 4 year-old that loves cars
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year-old nephew loves this! He can't wait to open a new box each day and he loves playing with all of the cars. This is perfect for the car lover in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Monique Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a countdown
customer_reviews.text: My son used this as his advent calendar this year. He looked forward to opening a different number each morning. He especially loved how many fire trucks were in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Megan G.

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Advent Calendar at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Advent Calendar for my nephew. He absolutely loved opening it every morning and was genuinely excited about each vehicle. I was really impressed with the quality of each item. They are very well made and have a lot of details in their design. I definitely recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Car calendar
customer_reviews.text: The boy absolutely loved this! Cars easily break, but it made him happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bcree

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Cars are not well made, but my son had fun opening them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loved this!! Such a great deal and even tho the cars aren’t as solid as name brand they all worked great and have moving parts, he continues to play with them still.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Sure to please a young child, nice advent calendar.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he loves it. The cars are just a cheap kind, but my daughter said he plays with them and looks forward to opening a door every morning!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Neeley

customer_reviews.title: My  4 year old nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: He keeps telling his mom how happy he is that "Aunty" sent him the calendar. He can't for each new day to see the new car. Loves playing with them with his older sister. A bit hit in the household.
customer_reviews.author: M. Salim

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I very much liked this item. It was for my son who was less than 2 years old at the time and he thoroughly enjoys them. They even have a spring loaded rear wheel so they can be pulled back and will take off. They’re relatively cheap made cars, but for the price, it’s not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Most of the cars look the same with different stickers on it. Fall apart easily. Underwhelming...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vehicle advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This was the best Advent calendar I sent my grandson. He enjoyed it every day and my daughter sent us videos. It really gave us some wonderful memories especially since we live so far away from each other. I will do this every year for my grandson
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute but....
customer_reviews.text: The cars are poorly made but for the price it was OK. I felt like there was nothing of substance really
customer_reviews.author: DTad

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a huge hit with my grandson. A car/truck everyday and they are pull back racers so very fun for him to play with. And it even comes with a little track as a bonus. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: scjhawk

customer_reviews.title: I need quantity not quality
customer_reviews.text: I used them in an advent calendar so they only had to last a month.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapingirly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yr old boys loves this calendar and actually adores the vehicles. The plastic is decent quality. One of the better advent calendars on the market. I could also see this as being a great tool for potty training or other incentive/rewards one door at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Christmas gift for 3 year old. And after the holiday they made awesome tub toys
customer_reviews.author: caryn chambers

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for the grandchildren. Arrived as promised and grandson enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: athiker

customer_reviews.title: Great surprises.
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful treat for my son to have 24 surprises that he loved to play with and race!
customer_reviews.author: SB Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: The cars and trucks were good quality and my great nephew loved opening the doors everyday. I would absolutely buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Pattymvp

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not for long
customer_reviews.text: My son had fun opening these but they were very easy to break
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Christmas HIT was the Favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriends son absolutely loved this so many cars and they are all the type that Wind up and move on their own Totally worth the price I paid such a value honestly can’t wait to get more of these for next Christmas
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: 5 yr old loves getting a vehicle each day
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money spent. No useless parts like so many calendars have. 5 yr old has loved getting a new vehicle each day. That being said the vehicles are very cheap plastic and doubt they will last for long.
customer_reviews.author: MN Geogal

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Cheal. On day 2 and 1st one doesnt roll at all on any surface including the one that comes with the calander and 2nd day barely works on wood floor. Cheap thin material. Should have went name brand hot wheels or little people. Anything but this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Three year old nephew LOVED them. Absolutely a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: The idea here is great, and each car was different and fun to unbox. many of the cars were too flimsy though and have separated from their bases at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a cool advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this advent calendar. I am so glad I got it for him. He is two years old. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S.

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Cars are light cheap plastic but they do pull back quite well and grandson is having fun opening them.
customer_reviews.author: Pjc

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: So far....and it’s only the 12th day we have had two cats not even work and they are all cheap plastic very poorly made....I wish I had done a different advent calendar for my 7 year old .
customer_reviews.author: Andrea fisher

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 1 year old are loving this! I love how they are able to get an actual car everyday vs other advent calendars that throw in just junky extra pieces. Will continue to buy this until my boys have had enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK MOST BROKEN BEFORE EVEN USING THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: JUNK IS BEST WORD TO DESCRIBE THESE!! Most had pieces broke off before even using them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, but the cars broke easily
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved the idea. It was super cool and they loved opening it everyday. However, some of the cars didn’t work and quite a few of them broke very easily. So the price was nice. But the cars were very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: matthew r.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the cars. I think it was work the money. You get what you pay for. It mad my son happy so no money was wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Looks like fun. It’s an advent calendar so really wont know how great it is till Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Son loved opening a new car every night. Some got broken quickly but he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lichty

product_meta.title: Purple Ladybug Novelty Car Stocking Stuffer Toy Cars 2019 Advent Calendar for Kids, with 24 Different Pull Back Vehicles Including Race Cars, Construction Vehicles! Perfect for Boys!
feature_bullets: GIVE 24 CARS AS THE PERFECT STOCKING STUFFER! 24 unique vehicle toys in this incredible and large toy advent calendar or stocking stuffer for kids. One a day, no repeats, all the cars, trucks and other vehicles are realistic and will zoom forward after being pulled back!

CAN BE USED AS A STOCKING STUFFER, TREATS FOR POSITIVE BEHAVIOR! Amazing for imaginative play - the box has a fold-down flap that turns into a race track! Use the race track and variety of cars, trucks, construction and other vehicles for fun imaginative play. Offer your little ones these as an option for screen-free creative fun!

MAKES A WONDERFUL AND FESTIVE GIFT! Help contribute to a child's with a new collection of toy cars. Plus - know that when you give a toy advent calendar from Purple Ladybug Novelty, your gift will arrive in a sturdy box with festive artwork that you'll be proud to give!

GET EXACTLY WHAT YOU SEE IN THE PHOTOS! Get exactly the vehicles that you see in the photos and video, including our larger firetruck with moveable ladder on Dec 24! No "random" surprises in this stocking stuffer or Christmas advent calendar 2019! The box comes in a protective sleeve so it arrives with all doors intact - simply remove it before first opening to reveal the perforated doors!
WE WANT YOU TO BE HAPPY! Your satisfaction matters to us! The Purple Ladybug logo is your guarantee of our high quality; contact us if you're not completely satisfied!
